```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lmerTest)
library(DiagrammeR)
schools <- read_csv('data/cmm/5.1.txt')

```

```{r}
m1 <- lmer(score ~  (1|schoolid), data=schools) 
summary(m1)
ranova(m1)
```

```{r}
m2 <- lmer(score ~ female + (1|schoolid), data=schools) 
summary(m2)
ranova(m2)
```




```{r}
ranef(m1) %>% as_tibble() %>% 
  sample_n(40) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(grp, condval, ymin=condval-condsd, ymax=condval+condsd)) + 
  geom_pointrange() + 
  geom_hline(yintercept=0)
```









```{r}
grViz("
      digraph ab {
      Smoking -> Unknown -> Stroke2
      Unknown -> Stroke1
      Stroke1 -> Stroke2 [style=invis]
      }
      ", height=300)

```
